/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is teeming with life, with cars and motorcycles adding a dynamic element to the scene. Buildings line the sides of the street, their facades painted in a variety of colors that add vibrancy to the urban landscape. Trees are scattered throughout the scene, their green foliage contrasting with the concrete structures. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The image is bathed in natural light, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
